Name: Passion Fruit Rum Punch
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop out flesh into shaker. Add next four ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) and then top with sparkling wine.
Review: Rum and fruit combine in this punchy tropical-style drink.
